text:
Legendary Israeli writer A.B. Yehoshua, 84, gets his #COVID19 #vaccine. Never shying away from the political, Yehoshua told TPS regarding the vaccine, "It's a small, important step. I hope the government also gets a vaccine for all its ills."

(Photo by Eitan Elhadez/TPS) https://t.co/QKbDgVqzwP
